venue.name: Will send when you sign up

item.description:
Hi All,

We always want to expand and what better way to do that than to listen an "experienced" presenter on a movie and open it up to discussion. We always gain a lot....bring in your positive energy and hopefully Monday night will work for more of you :)

 

As always there will be a slight #2-3 dollar charge to cover expenses.

 

See you soon!

 

Caryn
item.how_to_find_us: If you're new, we'll send address in Scarborough.
item.name: Continue our quest to expand our knowledge and growth!
